purpose: To provide a curated list of resources and benchmarks for understanding and advancing reasoning capabilities in foundation models.
principle: Aggregates and organizes research papers and benchmarks related to reasoning in large language models and multimodal models.
reusability: Open-source repository with a structured list of resources that can be easily accessed and utilized by researchers and developers.
limitations: Primarily serves as a resource aggregator; does not provide original research or implementations.
name: Awesome-Reasoning-Foundation-Models
description: ✨✨Latest Papers and Benchmarks in Reasoning with Foundation Models
highlight: Comprehensive collection of the latest research papers and benchmarks in reasoning with foundation models.
